title: [Dynamic Regions] tikv panic for [FATAL] [lib.rs:510] ["assertion failed: resp.has_availability_context()"]
body:
## Bug Report

### What version of TiKV are you using?
sh-5.1# ./tikv-server -V
TiKV 
Release Version:   7.3.0-alpha
Edition:           Community
Git Commit Hash:   47b4c474e73f6f51c19f137814c7daba78e9c093
Git Commit Branch: heads/refs/tags/v7.3.0-alpha
UTC Build Time:    2023-07-24 11:14:15
Rust Version:      rustc 1.67.0-nightly (96ddd32c4 2022-11-14)
Enable Features:   pprof-fp jemalloc mem-profiling portable sse test-engine-kv-rocksdb test-engine-raft-raft-engine cloud-aws cloud-gcp cloud-azure
Profile:           dist_release
sh-5.1# 


### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->

### Steps to reproduce
1. enable multi-rocks db
2. "/pd-ctl operator add merge-region 318 312"

### What did you expect?
opreation successfully
### What did happened?
